text: @realDonaldTrump The US is 4.25% of the world’s population yet we have 33.3% of the global #COVID19 cases.  How is that doing a “GREAT JOB”? A total failure of @realDonaldTrump , @GOP & @WhiteHouse and not the @WHO.  #clustertrump #covid19testsupression #trumpcovidfails #TrumpVirusCoverup https://t.co/KuLyn5Y9dh
